sentences.sentence: All enquiries will be dealt with as speedily as possible.
sentences.translation: 所有询问都将从速处理。

sentences.sentence: Some people who say they are able to read speedily are simply skimming.
sentences.translation: 有些说自己能快速阅读的人只是进行了略读。

sentences.sentence: It was some distance to the wood, but the space was speedily traversed.
sentences.translation: 那离树林还有一段距离，但他们很快就走完了。
